mapper.sql: PK_ID, RYJCXXCJBH, ZWZWDM, ZZHWQSQKDM, ZW_TXYSFFMS, ZW_TXZL, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME
mapper.select: select f.*,d1.name zwwz,d2.name zwqsqk from leden_collect_finger f left join sys_dict_list d1 on f.zwzwdm = d1.code and d1.sign = 'DICT_ZHZHWWZ' left join sys_dict_list d2 on f.zzhwqsqkdm = d2.code and d2.sign = 'DICT_ZHZHWQSH' where RYJCXXCJBH = #{id} and ZW_TXYSFFMS = '0000'
mapper.insert: insert into LEDEN_COLLECT_FINGER (PK_ID, RYJCXXCJBH, ZWZWDM, ZZHWQSQKDM, ZW_TXYSFFMS, ZW_TXZL, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME, ZW_TXSJ) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zwzwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzhwqsqkdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zwTxysffms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zwTxzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zwTxsj,jdbcType=BLOB})

mapper.update:
update LEDEN_COLLECT_FINGER
RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZW_TXSJ = #{zwTxsj,jdbcType=BLOB},
where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
